name: Blind Bond
description: A NEON POLYGONS GAME This game was made during the "Mini Jam 77: Courage." The theme was "Courage" and the limitation was "Game cannot take place on earth". WARNING ! FOR THIS GAME, YOU NEED TO PLAY WITH A FRIEND (preferably over voice-chat)! Simply set the same room name as your friend to player with him! BLIND BOND In this game, you have to travel amongst the levels to restore your vision with your friend. However, you will not be able to see yourself. You will only be able to see the level and your friend. Therefore, you will have to communicate with your friend to solve the puzzles. Good luck ! KNOWN BUG (Should be fixed!) Desynchronization can sometimes happen during the game. If one of the screen is all blurry, or you can suddenly only jump and not move, this might be it.  I sadly couldn't fix it in time for the GameJam, but you can refresh the page to fix it.
